channel.title: Little Shop problem
channel.description:
Yep,
I've made Donor Shop and added 2 items. So, when i click on those items it gives me: "This item cost's X Donor Points." [b]BUT[/b], when i buy the item... It buys with Coins!
I'm looking for it for about 1 hour now. Can someone tell me where to change his value?
Thank you.

item.title: Little Shop problem
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:29, topic:436943”][quote author=dzeko link=topic=539658.msg3950578#msg3950578 date=1332253391]

I’m not going to spoonfeed, just follow a tutorial mate

hmm lol?

can someone tell me why is this section called server help if people tell you to go ahead and follow a tut?

k…

forget all this shit just dont help me this is pathetic…
[/quote]
Because you need help if you can’t follow a tutorial.
Also, it’s the help section, not the “phr33 c0dez plawks” section.[/quote]
^this

item.title: Little Shop problem
item.dc:creator: @dzeko dzeko
item.description:
@dzeko wrote:

FIXEEEEEEEEEEEED…

} else if (c.myShopId == 9) {
				if (c.donorPoints >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) {
					if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){
						c.donorPoints -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID);
						c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1);
						c.getItems().resetItems(3823);
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("You do not have enough donor points to buy this item.");			
				}
			}
		}

item.title: Little Shop problem
item.dc:creator: @dzeko dzeko
item.description:
@dzeko wrote:



The problem of this code is that "c.getItems().deleteItem(6529, c.getItems().getItemSlot(6529), " are TOKKULS..

[b]i need something like this:[/b]
this was a code for Pk Points..

[code]if(c.myShopId == 47) {
                	if (c.donorPoints >= TotPrice2) {
						if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) {
							c.donorPoints -= TotPrice2;
							c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1);
							Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1;
							Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0;
							if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) {
								Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0;
							}
						} else {
							c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory.");
							break;
						}
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("You don't have enough Donor Points.");
						break;
					}
                }
			}[/code]

but when i enter this code, get 64 errors.. =s

The problem of this code is that "c.getItems().deleteItem(6529, c.getItems().getItemSlot(6529), " are TOKKULS…

i need something like this:
this was a code for Pk Points…

if(c.myShopId == 47) { if (c.donorPoints >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { c.donorPoints -= TotPrice2; c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough Donor Points."); break; } } }

but when i enter this code, get 64 errors… =s

Read full topic
